header-text.zh: 下列为可选的 Linux CEF 版本
header-text.en: Available Linux CEF versions are listed below.

error-text.zh: 无法加载 Linux CEF 版本。如果您处于离线状态，请在联网时重试。
error-text.en: Failed to load Linux CEF versions. If you are offline, try again when online.

confirm-delete.caption.zh: 删除 Linux CEF 版本

confirm-delete.message.zh: 大约可释放 {1} 存储空间。您确定要删除所有 Linux CEF {0} 平台吗？
confirm-delete.message.en: This will free approximately {1} storage. Are you sure you want to delete all platforms for Linux CEF {0}?
